snippet: Matteo Renzi engineered the Italian prime minister’s removal and is poised to succeed him, but now he faces the challenge of shaking the country out of its malaise.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Matteo Renzi, rising star in Italian politics who engineered the removal of sitting Prime Min Enrico Letta, member of Renzi's own Democratic Party, and is poised to succeed him; Renzi faces the challenge of shaking the country out of its malaise.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo and Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Matteo Renzi engineered the Italian prime minister’s removal and is poised to succeed him, but now he faces the challenge of shaking the country out of its malaise.

headline.main: Political Star Rises on Vow to Upend Italy’s Old Order
headline.print_headline: Political Star Rises on Vow to Upend Italy’s Old Order
